hymn.title: In the hour of trial
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By the Lord's Care

layout.singingstanza: In the hour of tri -- al, Je -- sus, plead for me, Lest by base de -- ni -- al, I de -- part from Thee; When Thou seest me wav -- er, With a look re -- call, Nor for fear or fav -- or Suf -- fer me to fall.

lyrics.stanza: In the hour of trial, Jesus, plead for me, Lest by base denial, I depart from Thee; When Thou seest me waver, With a look recall, Nor for fear or favor Suffer me to fall.
When the last hour cometh, Fraught with strife and pain, When Thou, Lord, returneth To the earth again; On Thy truth relying As that hour draws near, Jesus, take me, waiting, To Thy presence dear.
